description:
Course Objective

Dont depend on game develop software such as GameSalad and other limited software. Learning to CODE your own game is the best way to learn and will teach you EVERYTHING you need to know about coding.

It can earn you passive income as well as help you land jobs!

This course will teach you how to build your own multi-platform games from scratch.

We teach you everything from learning java to building your very first multiplatform game.

Even if you have no prior experience, thats fine, we start from the basics.

Once you have developed your first game for ios and android you can deploy it on either platform you wish.

This course comes with over 100 hours of video content. It offers an incredible amount of value, some say valued as taking a full college semester class!

Course Structure

  • First we teach you the basics of java and advance java topics tailored specifically for game development. The java course is over 10 videos.
  • The second half of this course is all about learning how to building mulit-platform mobile games using LibGDX.
  • We will also include videos on marketing and publishing your app.

The Mastermind

  • You also gain FREE access to our student mastermind where you can collaborate, ask questions, get answers share ideas, and gain knowledge from other students just like you.

Webinars

  • I will also periodically host webinars, and google plus hangouts to answer your questions and share other knowledge with you.

Future Updates

  • We will also be providing new course updates for students. Showing you new features, how to do different things, and even using more features of the engine. We will also do videos of requested features by our students.

How Long Will This Course Take?

  • This course is over 100 hours long, so it will take you a few days to complete this course.
  • We make sure we really explain topics and make sure you understand. We also provide further documentation for you to read over along with the videos.

Why Take This Course

Right now the app market is the biggest growing the industry.

Why not start developing your own games and start making a passive income?

We don't just teach you to build android or ios games specifically. We teach you to build MULTIPLATFORM games.

This means code once, and deploy on android and ios markets.
title: Mobile Game Development: Building Multi-platform Games
